name: Daisu-ki
description:
GMTK Game Jam 2022 submission

Only Levels 1-3 are available due to game jam time restrictions.

How to Play

Your goal is to unite the two dice in love back together. To do this, they have to be adjacent to each other and add up to 7. The dice can push each other. The tiles with numbers only allow you to pass when the die shows that number. The spikes toggle every time a die moves, but not when you swap players.

Controls

Space/A - swap players/select level

Enter/Start - restart level

WASD/arrow keys - move player

Shift/Select - menu

Credits

The background music is a previously made asset by krümel (crumb)#0723.

Everything else is made by me (Yousurname).
